identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber Command Center' dashboard that feels powerful, stealthy, and precise. Avoid generic SaaS templates.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Terminal' aesthetics with 'Swiss' precision.
Emotion First: The user should feel like a hacker/operator in control.
Content is King: Data density is crucial. No wasted space.
Contrast: High contrast neon against deep void backgrounds.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700&display=swap');

structure.sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 border-r border-white/10 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-xl z-50
structure.header: sticky top-0 z-40 w-full border-b border-white/10 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md

card.style: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-white/10 rounded-lg backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-white/20 transition-colors duration-200

button.primary: bg-sky-500 hover:bg-sky-600 text-white font-medium shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(14,165,233,0.3)] transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(14,165,233,0.5)]

input.style: bg-zinc-950 border-white/10 focus:border-sky-500/50 focus:ring-sky-500/20 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600

status_badge.active: bg-green-500/10 text-green-400 border border-green-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase
status_badge.banned: bg-red-500/10 text-red-400 border border-red-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase
status_badge.pending: bg-yellow-500/10 text-yellow-400 border border-yellow-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase

assets.icons: Use lucide-react for all icons. Prefer thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'src/index.css' immediately.
3. THEME: Force dark mode in 'tailwind.config.js' or 'index.css'. The app should default to dark.
4. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Header. Wrap all protected routes in this.
5. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components in 'src/components/ui' to match the 'Card' and 'Input' styles defined above. Remove default shadows and add borders.
6. CHARTS: Use 'recharts' for the Analytics page. Style them with the defined palette colors (Primary for main data, Secondary for comparison).
7. TABLES: Use Shadcn Table. Ensure rows have hover effects ('hover:bg-white/5').
8. LOGIN: Use the 'login_bg' image as a full-screen background with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80) to ensure the login form pops.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) using kebab-case (e.g., 'login-submit-btn').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: DO NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specified.
DO NOT center-align the main app container.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy drop shadows.
